content: You can look for an exit to the boss arena on the far side, which leads to a ledge with a green Wisp, and a drop back down to the main path from the Shrine.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Webbed_Hollow-Lower_Hollow_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Webbed Hollow - Lower Hollow Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Yaoguai Chief Miniboss Fight - Baw-Li-Guhh-Baw'.
The content is as follows:
You can look for an exit to the boss arena on the far side, which leads to a ledge with a green Wisp, and a drop back down to the main path from the Shrine.
